keyQuestions.question: When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Quality/Durability
When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you in deciding which one to purchase:(select one per aspect) - Price/Value

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Organic materials (eg. cotton grown without pesticides to minimise environmental impacts)

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Fairtrade materials (eg. cotton sourced from producers in developing countries and certified to provide enhanced workplace, social and environmental outcomes)

When considering which surf clothing product to buy, how important are the following aspects to you right now in deciding which one to purchase?(select one per aspect) - includes Recycled materials (eg. polyester made from re-used plastic)
If there are any other sustainability aspects that you consider when purchasing surf clothing please say what they are: - Open-Ended Response
Which of the following surf brands have you purchased a product from in the past 12 months? (select any that apply) - Rip Curl
Have you ever chosen a surf clothing product specifically because of its sustainability (such as organic, Fairtrade, recycled) attributes? - Response
Please indicate your agreement with the following statements: (select one per statement) - I think that the brands in the surf industry currently have a strong focus on being sustainable
